description:
Relax and unwind as you search for hidden objects and play fun mini-games!
Escape to nature in beautifully created garden scenes. Seach for hidden objects, play fun and challenging mini-games, and enjoy the relaxing music. 
Complete your own beautiful garden scene and learn about different plants from all over the world.

- 24 chapters of nature fun!
- Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
- Fun facts about fun plants!
- Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
- Decorate your very own garden!
name: Nature Escapes 2 Collector's Edition
intro: Nature Escapes returns with another fun hidden object challenge!
